pages.text: The $(mob)Hunter$() is a flying monster that spawns in the $(thing)Midnight$(). It hunts $(l:midnight_nightstag)$(mob)Nightstags$(), $(l:midnight_skulk)$(mob)Skulks$(), and players by flying overhead and swooping down to attack, dealing damage and inflicting $(thing)Torment$() on its target. Despite their size, $(mob)Hunters$() can pass through a single-block space unimpeded.
$(mob)Hunters$() drop $(item)Hunter Wings$() on death. These are a decent source of food when cooked.
